abstract.description: This code for analysing and benchmarking of the DoubleElectron, DoubleMuon and MuEG datasets is set up at Research level, i.e. it requires university-student-level programming experience. Minimal acquaintance with Linux and the ROOT analysis package (https://root.cern.ch/) as well as a basic text editor is needed.

note.description: The output of the code at different stages is described in readme.txt

system_details.description: Use this code with the CMS Open Data VM environment

title: Analysis code for measurements of top quark pair production in dilepton channel at 7 TeV using 2011 data

usage.description:
If you do not have the CERN Virtual Machine for 2011 CMS data installed, follow the instructions in step 1 at How to install a CERN Virtual Machine.

To run the analysis, follow the instructions in https://github.com/cms-opendata-validation/2011-doubleelectron-doublemu-mueg-ttbar.

use_with.description: Use this with 2011 DoubleElectron, DoubleMuon and MuEG collision datasets and the simulated datasets listed below (see the detailed instructions in the readme files and code).
